title: The Flavor of Gold Leaf?
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>I’ve finished setting it up. You should be able to start livestreaming whenever you want.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you, Rina-san. I appreciate your help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m good at stuff like this, so feel free to ask anytime. I’m always happy to help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>If you don’t mind then, I’ll continue to rely on you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course. Rina-chan Board says, “Heh!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Now then, shall we partake of some tea? I have some delicious matcha pudding.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Wow, it even has gold leaf on it! How does it taste?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hmhm, I wonder... Why don’t you try it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Here goes... I don’t get it... All I can taste is the delicious pudding...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Would you care to try the gold leaf on mine? Here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Nom... I still can’t taste anything different... But, the pudding is really good! Oh, I think I get it. Does the gold leaf make the pudding more delicious?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I personally don’t know about the taste either, but I think I agree with you that it makes the matcha pudding more delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
